idea:
Karmshala is a first of its kind creative & innovative space for startups, entrepreneurs, and creative professionals. 

Our members include founders, technologists, artists, investors, F&B business people, and creative professionals to name a few.

Our strength is the community of creators across different genres and sectors in a physical space that enables high-impact collaboration and growth. 

Over 6 floors, we have:

1. Workspace and innovation space for members. 
2. A performance theatre for creative professionals and business people.
3. A cafe and culinary studio to explore innovation in the F&B space.
4. An organic terrace with urban farming and a solar roof.
name: KARMSHALA VENTURE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We are a Manufacturer & exporter of our own pharmaceutical products. and we manufacture all products from third party manufacturers and do marketing in India and abroad.
name: ASTROZEN PHARMACEUTICALS PRIVATE LIMITED
